level-1: This ensures basic integrity by checking for null values, validating data types, and enforcing essential constraints, guaranteeing the fundamental correctness of the data.
level-2: This level performs cross-document validation, ensuring consistency and coherence between related fields across different documents under a Employer/Plan Type, maintaining data integrity at a broader scope.
level-3: Leveraging external resources such as databases or services, Level 3 validation conducts thorough checks to ensure accuracy and compliance with external standards or regulations.
